title: Richard Dawkins - Wikipedia
snippet: He is an emeritus fellow of New College, Oxford. In 1995 he was named the first Simonyi Professor for the Public Understanding of Science, a position he held until 2008, and is on the advisory board of the University of Austin. Dawkins has won several academic and writing awards, among them ...

title: Richard Dawkins | Vrije Universiteit Brussel
snippet: From 1995 to 2008, Dawkins was a professor at the University of Oxford, holding the Charles Simonyi Chair for the Public Understanding of Science. He used this position to promote science and rational thinking, becoming known for his sharp criticism ...

title: Richard Dawkins: Social Sciences and Humanities H-index & Awards - Academic Profile | Research.com
snippet: Literature, Genetics, Gene-centered view of evolution, Evolutionary biology and Art history are his primary areas of study. Richard Dawkins has included themes like Aesthetics, Darwinism and Wonder in his Literature study.

title: Richard Dawkins | Biography, Books, The God Delusion, The Selfish Gene, & Facts | Britannica
snippet: After earning his master’s and ... Dawkins assisted Tinbergen before becoming an assistant professor of zoology (1967–69) at the University of California, Berkeley....

title: Professor Richard Dawkins FRS
snippet: Richard is a prominent scientist, having published bestselling books on genetics and evolution, including The Selfish Gene (1976), The Blind Watchmaker (1986) — with the latter winning a number of awards.
